channel.title: Outreach on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in Outreach on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: Survey: Share your feedback on OONI tools, resources and documentation
item.description:
OONIâ€™s community now includes over 50 organisations and hundreds of thousands of OONI Probe users all over the world.

We are very thankful for your trust in our tools, your support over the years and your contributions to different parts of OONI-verse through collected measurements, localisation projects, and research projects.

With this survey, we want to reflect on our community activities and learn how we can improve upon our outreach, tools and documentation.
